search.js

Implementation for the search functionality of Firefox Panorama.

Summary
search.jsImplementation for the search functionality of Firefox Panorama.
Functions
scorePatternMatchGiven a pattern string, returns a score between 0 and 1 of how well that pattern matches the original string.
TabMatcherA singleton class that allows you to iterate over matching and not-matching tabs, given a case-insensitive search term.
Functions
matchedReturns an array of TabItems which match the current search term.
unmatchedReturns all of TabItems that .matched() doesn’t return.
doSearchPerforms the search.
SearchEventHandlerClassA singleton class that handles all of the event handlers.
Functions
initInitializes the searchbox to be focused, and everything else to be hidden, and to have everything have the appropriate event handlers;
beforeSearchKeyHandlerHandles all keypresses before the search interface is brought up.
inSearchKeyHandlerHandles all keypresses while search mode.
switchToBeforeModeMake sure the event handlers are appropriate for the before-search mode.
switchToInModeMake sure the event handlers are appropriate for the in-search mode.

Functions

scorePatternMatch

function scorePatternMatch(pattern,
matched,
offset)

Given a pattern string, returns a score between 0 and 1 of how well that pattern matches the original string.  It mimics the heuristics of the Mac application launcher Quicksilver.

TabMatcher

A singleton class that allows you to iterate over matching and not-matching tabs, given a case-insensitive search term.

Summary
Functions
matchedReturns an array of TabItems which match the current search term.
unmatchedReturns all of TabItems that .matched() doesn’t return.
doSearchPerforms the search.

Functions

matched

matched: function matched()

Returns an array of TabItems which match the current search term.  If the term is less than 2 characters in length, it returns nothing.

unmatched

unmatched: function unmatched()

Returns all of TabItems that .matched() doesn’t return.

doSearch

doSearch: function(matchFunc,
unmatchFunc)

Performs the search.  Lets you provide two functions, one that is called on all matched tabs, and one that is called on all unmatched tabs.  Both functions take two parameters: A TabItem and its integer index indicating the absolute rank of the TabItem in terms of match to the search term.

SearchEventHandlerClass

A singleton class that handles all of the event handlers.

init

init: function ()

Initializes the searchbox to be focused, and everything else to be hidden, and to have everything have the appropriate event handlers;

beforeSearchKeyHandler

beforeSearchKeyHandler: function (event)

Handles all keypresses before the search interface is brought up.

inSearchKeyHandler

inSearchKeyHandler: function (event)

Handles all keypresses while search mode.

switchToBeforeMode: function switchToBeforeMode()

Make sure the event handlers are appropriate for the before-search mode.

switchToInMode: function switchToInMode()

Make sure the event handlers are appropriate for the in-search mode.
